author: sky.cactus
content: My first recommendation is to learn a language besides PHP.  Shouldn't be too hard, but worth it as PHP is not particularly good at doing any kind of security critical engineering and there are basically no integrations with PHP.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you want to write contracts, then Solidity.  For applications, TypeScript.  For clients, Rust, Go, C#, Java.
